original_text:
Yet the righteous holds to his way,
    and he who has clean hands grows stronger and stronger.
korean_text: 그러므로 의인은 그 길을 꾸준히 가고 손이 깨끗한 자는 점점 힘을 얻느니라

sentences.original_text: Yet the righteous holds to his way
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 의인은 자기 길을 굳게 붙잡고

sentences.original_text: and he who has clean hands
